CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Skyline Station?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Skyline Station is arc {West Cross}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc West Cross?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc West Cross is arc {Skyline Station}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Valley Terminal} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Harbor Point} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Valley Terminal to Harbor Point in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Harbor Point to East Junction in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from West Cross to Valley Terminal in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between West Cross and Valley Terminal in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between West Cross and Valley Terminal is {80}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between East Junction and Valley Terminal in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between East Junction and Valley Terminal is {103}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Harbor Point?
SC.A: The total flow output from Harbor Point is {111}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by West Cross?
SC.A: The total flow input by West Cross is {106}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 105? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {108} from {Valley Terminal} to {Harbor Point}, a flow of {107} from {East Junction} to {Valley Terminal}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 25? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {21} from {Skyline Station} to {West Cross}, a flow of {14} from {Harbor Point} to {West Cross}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 59 and 66? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {66} from {West Cross} to {Skyline Station}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Harbor Point to East Junction or from East Junction to Harbor Point?
NC.A: The flow from {East Junction} to {Harbor Point} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from West Cross to Harbor Point, from Harbor Point to West Cross, or from East Junction to Harbor Point?
NC.A: The flow from {West Cross} to {Harbor Point} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {West Cross}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {East Junction} and {Valley Terminal}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Valley Terminal, Arc East Junction, Arc Harbor Point, Arc West Cross, Arc Skyline Station}.
